title: TBD | The Summer Vaccine of the Future
description:
LYMErix, the first vaccine against Lyme, was pulled from the market amid poor sales and pressure from the public. Now, over 20 years later, a new vaccine is in late-stage trials.
Guest: Cassandra Willyard
Host: Lizzie O'Leary
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: TBD | The Summer Vaccine of the Future
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: A new Lyme vaccine that's in late-stage trials would be the first in 20 years.
